早稲田大学 創造理工学部 経営システム工学科 / 早稲田大学大学院 創造理工学研: Waseda University, Creative Science and Engineering, Department of Industrial and Management Systems Engineering
我々は、ソフトウェア工学を軸に、様々な研究に日々取り組んでいます。: We are working on various research daily on the basis of software engineering.
分野はSPL、テスト、検証を中心に、対象はネイティブアプリやモダンWeb、IoT: Our field is centered on SPL, testing and verification. The target covers a wide range of native applications, modern web applications, and IoT.
ソフトウェア工学を軸に研究を行なっています。: We study a wide range of fields centered on software engineering.
大規模な社会インフラからモバイル機器まで、日常生活を支えるあらゆるシステムが情報: From large-scale social infrastructure to mobile equipment, every system that supports daily life is realized by information technology. Software supports this information technology. Software engineering is a field that studies how to make software, how to use it, and how to evolve in a changing business environment / technology environment. In our laboratory, we are addressing various problems of software engineering, centering on software design utilizing modeling technology. We are challenging various architectures to deal with such problems as how to make software with architecture, how to make similar software effectively, how to check the correctness of the software we made, and so on.
1980年 京都大学 工学部情報工学科 卒業: 1980: Graduated from Department of Information Engineering, Faculty of Engineering, Kyoto University
1982年 京都大学大学院 工学研究科情報工学専攻 修士課程 修了: 1982: Graduated from graduate School of Engineering, Kyoto University Master's Program in Information Engineering
2002年 北陸先端科学技術大学院大学 情報科学研究科 博士後期課程 修了: 2002: Completion of doctoral course at School of Information Science, Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology
2003年 北陸先端科学技術大学院大学 情報科学研究科 着任: 2003: Joined the School of Information Science, Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology
2009年 早稲田大学 創造理工学部経営システム工学科 教授: 2009: Waseda University Professor of Management System Engineering Department of Creative Science and Engineering Department
岸研究室は充実した設備が整っています: Kishi laboratory has plenty of fulfilling equipment.
WindowsOSを搭載したデスクトップPCやSurface Bookを含むノー: We have many desktop PCs with Windows OS and laptops such as the latest Surface Book. We also have a few MacOS such as iMac and the latest MacBook Pro. In addition, we have a large number of displays to improve working efficiency. Recently, we also introduced a tablet such as iPad.
岸研究室には、PC周辺機器を含め様々な機器が充実しています。大型TVをはじめ、3: Kishi laboratory has various fulfilling equipment including PC peripheral equipment. We also have large-format TVs, 3D printers and NAS, Apple TV, wireless display adapters.
情報システムやソフトウェア工学関連の書籍をはじめ、プログラミング入門書からO'R: We have plenty of technical books, from introductory books on programming to professional books on O'Reilly.
加湿・空気清浄機やコーヒーメーカー、冷蔵庫、電子レンジに加えて、温度調整と自動保: In addition to humidifier / air purifiers, coffee makers, refrigerators and microwave ovens, we also have extensive furniture such as smart kettle that combines temperature control and automatic heat retention. The whole room of the laboratory is also beautiful in a spacious space.
研究を中心に様々な活動を行なっています。: We are doing various activities centering on research.
毎週水曜日に全体ゼミ、毎週月曜日に修士ゼミを行なっております。全体ゼミではゼミ生: We hold a research seminar every Wednesday and a master 's research seminar every Monday. In the whole research seminar, our students will mainly report the progress of the research. In master's research seminar, master's students work on lectures and tasks. In addition, we also occasionally do B3 seminars, Java seminars by master's students for B3, intensive seminars just prior to graduation thesis and study. Our research topics mainly working on are
合宿は、年に２回、夏と秋に行なっております。夏合宿は春の発表に向けてあと半年どう: We hold seminar camps twice a year, in summer and autumn. The summer camp is an important camp that decides how to deepen research in the next six months for spring presentation. For B3 to enter the fall semester newly, the autumn camp is being held to deepen friendship. So B3 students can get along with their seniors.
1月に修士論文・卒業論文を提出したあと、2月にその審査会が行われます。学生が長い: We submit master's thesis / bachelor thesis in January. After that, presentation examination of the paper is held in February. It is a very important opportunity for students to present their research achievements seriously taken over a long period of time. The title list of the master thesis and the bachelor thesis is
岸研究室では、教授・学生共に、対外発表や論文投稿も行なっております。ポスター発表: At the Kishi Laboratory, both professors and students are presenting presentations on external conferences and papers. We are publishing research results at various opportunities including poster presentation, presentation presentation at national convention and presentation at research meeting. Some of us have also won several awards. Details are
2017年夏に岸研究室として初めて、早稲田大学理工学術院主催の小中学生の科学実験: In the summer of 2017, Kishi Laboratory exhibited for the first time at the scientific experiment seminar "Unilab" of elementary and junior high school students organized by Waseda University. Our students organized a programming seminar for one of those seminars. We held a seminar on game making for elementary school students using Visual Programming 's Scratch which attract attention from the education industry. The seminar was a great success. We were able to satisfy our children.
岸研究室では、様々な学習活動・プログラムにも積極的に参加しております。毎年、情報: Kishi laboratory actively participates in various learning activities and programs. Every year, I participate in enPit summer training camp of information technology education program. Also, in order to deepen our knowledge, students participate in the ICSE study group sponsored by SIGSE of IPSJ from 2016 and the students are making presentations.
教授は本大学にて、主に以下の講義を担当しております。: Professor is mainly in charge of the following classes at Waseda University. Those who belong to Kishi laboratory are sure to attend, but we can also attend non-Kishi laboratory so please consider it.
教授は書籍等の出版にも携わっています。以下、主要著書です。: Professor is also involved in publications such as books. Below is the main book.(Japanese publications are written in Japanese titles below)
[共著]オブジェクト指向最前線―情報処理学会OO’97シンポジウム, 朝倉書店(: [Co-author]オブジェクト指向最前線―情報処理学会OO’97シンポジウム, 朝倉書店(1997)

[共著]ソフトウェアエンジニアリング最前線〈2009〉, 近代科学社(2009): [Co-author]ソフトウェアエンジニアリング最前線〈2009〉, 近代科学社(2009)

主な研究分野はテスト/モデル検査/SPLです。: Our focused research areas are SPL, Testing and Model Checking.
近年、ソフトウェア開発の期間は短くなってきています。 その中で品質を確保するため: In recent years, the period of software development is getting shorter. Among them, the importance of software test is growing to ensure quality. Such software testing is a part of software engineering and is an indispensable field. In recent years, we are also conducting research on tests targeting Web applications.
ソフトウェア設計の正しさを確認するためには手作業では不十分かつ非効率です。例えば: It is not enough and inefficient in the hand in order to check the correctness of the software design has been described in a model such as UML. For example, by applying the scientific technique called model checking techniques, It will be expected to carry out the design verification in a more reliable high and less manpower. The methods and environments for the effective use and have been studied in an actual software development such a scientific approach.
一定の共通性を持った製品群を全体最適の観点から捉え、戦略的・体系的に開発するアプ: The approach which catches product aggregate with the fixed common characteristic from the angle of the whole suitability and develops it strategically systematically is software product linear development. In its realization , to organize the requirements of the product group in a systematic manner , and to design the appropriate software architecture for receiving it, Development of reusable assets in light of it , you will need to be managed. We study these highly codified technique and for its technology .
岸研究室では主な３つに加えて様々な分野に取り組んでいます。近年盛んになっているI: Kishi laboratory is working on various fields in addition to the main three. I am also researching the latest technologies such as IoT, Machine Learning, Modern Web, Mobile Application, VR / AR, Visual Programming, etc. which have become popular recently.
